TextView.android:text: Ainsdale Opening times: Open all year round Lifeguard cover: No Parking: Beach parking off Shore Road, Ainsdale. Car park charge £4.50 - £6.00 Dog friendly: Yes, but there is a dog free zone for 200m either side of the beach entrance at Shore Road. Toilets: Yes, at the beach entrance at the end of Shore Road. Local shops: Ainsdale village has shops, cafes and restaurants Ice cream: There are usually ice cream vans dotted around the area
